casebody.data:
Ellen M. MANZO-ILL
v.
Samuel V. SCHOONMAKER III et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 8, 2019

James H. Lee, Fairfield, in support of the petition.

Scott S. Centrella, and Timothy P. Moylan, Stamford, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 188 Conn. App. 343, 204 A.3d 1207, is denied.
